summary: Activity code sometimes fails to execute when the same activity method is called multiple times with different arguments inside a workflow, despite showing as completed in history. Workaround is to use different method names for each activity call.
userImpact: Activities fail to execute silently when called multiple times by name in a workflow, causing unpredictable behavior despite successful history records.
rootCause: Likely activity name-based deduplication or caching mechanism incorrectly preventing subsequent calls to the same activity method from executing.
workaround: Use different method names for each activity call instead of reusing the same method name with different arguments.
resolutionDetails: Issue closed by reporter due to no feedback, likely due to inactivity rather than confirmation of fix.
keyQuote: It might be because of the same activity name method... When changed the code to use different method names it worked
